title: SaaS Pricing Model Optimization
description: Product team reconsidering pricing strategy after market research

options.name: Usage-Based Pricing
options.description: Charge based on projects, tasks, or storage used

options.name: Freemium Model
options.description: Free tier for small teams, premium for advanced features

options.name: Tiered Feature Pricing
options.description: Multiple tiers based on feature access, not users

options.name: Enterprise Custom Pricing
options.description: Keep current model but add enterprise tier with custom pricing

expectedOutput.reasoning: Highest revenue potential with manageable risk and strong market fit trends
